dcterms:description: OPV2V is a publicized open-source simulated dataset for V2V perception, collected in CARLA and OpenCDA, consisting of 594 frames in the digital town of Culver City, Los Angeles, used for V2V cooperative perception tasks.
dcterms:title: OPV2V
